transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Hello, good afternoon.
Customer: Good afternoon sir.
Executive: Main Mohit baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se aapka account manager. Kaisi hain aap?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Mam aapki service ke regarding maine connect kiya tha jaise abhi Savariya soaps and hair oils pe maine call kiya tha. To abhi aapki service kaise chal rahi hai? Matlab kya issue aa raha hai aapko apni service se related?
Customer: Sir mere ko bataya gaya tha ki matlab 36000 mere se credit card se karwaye the ID banane ke liye. Maine GST vagera ke liye teen mahine tak matlab mashakkat karke jaise taise karke GST payment vagera sab kiya. Uske baad Shashank sir ko main call laga rahi hun na to wo call receive kar rahe hain na hi matlab koi yahi nahi. Ek din lagaya to bole ki 12 baje baad call karna abhi call mat karna uske baad to unka koi response hi nahi hai. Matlab kya yahi hai ki sirf paise lete time hi aap log phone to phone karte uske baad nahi kar sakte?
Customer: Nahi mere ko koi order mila hai koi ye ulta agar hum log jis matlab mere ko lead mili thi isse ki inpe phone karo to aapko wo sare ke sare sirf sabun bechte hain kharidte koi bhi nahi hai tel bechte hain kharidte koi bhi nahi hai usme se.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Executive: To isme aap jo lead consume karti hain, theek hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To aap jo buylead consume karti hain mam, consume karne ke baad apna aap customer ko call bhi to karti hogi na?
Customer: Karte hain sir par wahi yahi bolte hain na humko ki humko kharidna thodi hai bechna hai hum to khud seller hain.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Wo bhi sirf do se teen baar lead aayi mere paas aaj do dhai mahine ho gaye mere ko payment dale hue.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Abhi tak koi response nahi hai.
Executive: Achcha. Abhi IndiaMART app bhi use karti hain?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Achcha. Mam ek minute aap line pe rahiyega.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aapke paas aap lead consume karti hain jaise bath soap ka lead ho gaya. Theek hai? Ek minute.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aap jo hum deal karte hain, aap deal karte hain Savariya ye hibiscus homemade cream, right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Neem homemade soap ho gaya aapka. Theek hai? Multani mitti homemade soap ho gaya.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To ye aapne Savariya ke naam se apna is tarah se brand aap bana rahe hain, right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai? To isme thoda sa na dekho aapke paas leads to aa rahi hain main abhi bhi dekh raha hun ki aap agar isko aap abhi system pe hain mam thoda sa?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai aap ek kaam kijiyega main aapko ek Google meet ka link share karu aap join karenge mam?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan mam ek minute line rahiye main aapko link share karta hun.
Customer: Theek hai.
(silence)
Executive: Mam ye jo mail ID hai na aapki kamdarvineeta20@gmail.com
Customer: Nahi sir ispe nahi hai Jyoti Patidar Kitu Patidar ke naam se hai.
Customer: Maine Shashank sir se yahi bola tha ki mere number change kar dijiye aap isi number se sari information ye kar dijiye ID bhi change karne ke liye bola tha bole ki haan main sara kar dunga par unhone kuch bhi nahi kiya.
Executive: Achcha achcha. Aur jo primary number hai mam wo kiska number hai?
Customer: Ye wo bhi Vineeta Kamdar ka hi hai.
Executive: Achcha ye aap kaun hai aap isko use karti hain aur Vineeta Kamdar kaun hai Vineeta Patidar kaun hai?
Customer: Wo wo meri badi sister hai actually uski shadi ho gayi hai tabhi maine unse bola tha sir se jab payment dala tha na tabhi ki sir wo is ghar se jane wali hai to main aap mere number matlab do ID chahiye thi unko aur do number chahiye the to uske number lagaye the par sir ne uska number pehle laga diya aur mera number baad me lagaya unhone to lead vagera jati hai uske paas jati hai wo bolti bhi hai baat bhi karti hu wo recording bhi pahunchati hai mere paas ki ye to sare seller hai koi bhi buyer koi bhi nahi hai isme se.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Customer: To ye ye bhi bola tha sir se ki aap
Executive: Chalo to ye
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai aapko na dekho yahan pe jo ek baar apna mail aap bolna jara.
Customer: Kitu Patidar
Executive: Ek minute mam. Achcha main ek kaam karta hun aapko link ek baar copy karke main whatsapp karu kya?
Customer: Haan theek hai.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Mam aapke paas system hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Mam system se join karenge ya phone se aap?
Customer: Phone se.
Executive: Phone se. System hai aapke paas agar aap hain to agar system se join kar sakti hain to bataiye. Main aapka email aur ye aapka mobile number ye change kara dunga abhi.
Customer: Sir mere system yahan nahi hai.
Executive: Kaise?
Customer: Matlab mere paas abhi to available nahi hai phone hi hai abhi to direct.
Executive: Achcha achcha. Chalo koi nahi aap phone se join karo ek baar, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Maine aapko Google ka Google meeting ka link aapko whatsapp kiya hai. Theek hai aap join karo main aapka number vagera sari cheeze change karata hun. Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay mam. Join karo maine bhi join kiya hai mam.
Customer: Sir mere paas aaya hi nahi hai abhi to.
Executive: Yes mam?
Customer: Mere paas abhi nahi aaya aapne kya bheja hai?
Executive: Mam maine whatsapp pe Google meeting ka link bheja hai aapke number pe.
Customer: Mere number pe nahi aaya sir.
Customer: Mera number ye hai main aapko pahuncha rahi hun ye wala.
Executive: Aapka number yahi wala hai na jispe 87241122065. Haan haan aa gaya aa gaya aa gaya. Haan to isi pe bheja hai maine.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Yes. Aap join kijiyega mam.
Customer: Ji.
(silence)
[inaudible]
[inaudible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received any orders.

- Leads received are only sellers, not buyers.

- Wants number and ID to be changed.

- Shashank is not responding to calls.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to share a Google Meet link.

- Executive offered to change the customer's number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a Google Meet link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, change number, google meet
